posts.post_content:
PSA 2 - T206 Demmitt St.L - nice looking card!

If interested, please send a message, and I'll be happy to provide more pics and details.
Reverse / back of T206 Demmitt St. Louis PSA 2

Several people have asked, so I thought I would 'reply all'.

The upper left corner is a heavy crease (slight folded over), and is not a rip or tear. My apologies, it's tough to tell from the photo, which isn't the best (taken with iPhone).

Also, the pictures don't do the colors justice - the yellow on front and dark blue on reverse are bold & vibrant.
Several folks have requested scans...(original photos were from iPhone)...
